subtasks: Harvesting mature chillies from the plant

tasks.task: Preparing a small pot for growing chillies
subtasks: Finding a small pot with drainage holes
Covering drainage holes with small stones
Filling the pot with potting mix (70% organic compost and 30% fine sand)
Pressing the potting mix with hands

tasks.task: Removing the video content unrelated to chile cultivation
subtasks: Dismissing references to various user names and numbers
